body: Ciao Giuseppe, Sometimes, even if you run the Honebee_update component, you have to manually update those that change the number of inputs/outputs by replacing them. The errors that you usually get sound like "Solution exception:global name 'HBGenerators_' is not defined". [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/1zNsEY*-CrJ-9Z1Kfqwh2TaFXbVMyiixKGmegzSWhX-5vIH3J6jXX2N4mRu-urY2BsdhIhVK3-rp6zvLQb7wRPT9e3FuSqiC/Canvasat164808.png) See file attached.
